018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.report;
019
020import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.DistributedLogStore;
021import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.Action;
022import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
023import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.JsonState;
024import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
025import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
026
027import org.json.JSONObject;
028import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
029
030import java.io.InputStream;
031import java.nio.file.Files;
032import java.nio.file.Path;
033import java.nio.file.Paths;
034import java.sql.Connection;
035import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
036import java.sql.ResultSet;
037import java.util.Map;
038import java.util.logging.Level;
039import java.util.logging.Logger;
040
041/**
042 * Actor for building and outputting workflow reports.
043 *
044 * <p>This actor wraps a {@link ReportBuilder} POJO and provides workflow-callable
045 * actions via {@code @Action} annotations. It handles the integration with the
046 * actor system, database, and output multiplexer.</p>
047 *
048 * <h2>Actions:</h2>
049 * <ul>
050 *   <li>{@code addWorkflowInfo} - Add workflow metadata section</li>
051 *   <li>{@code addJsonStateSection} - Add actor's JsonState as YAML</li>
052 *   <li>{@code addTransitionSection} - Add transition summary from logs</li>
053 *   <li>{@code report} - Build and output the report</li>
054 * </ul>
055 *
056 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
057 * @since 2.15.0
058 */
059public class ReportBuilderIIAR extends IIActorRef<ReportBuilder> {
060
061    private static final String CLASS_NAME = ReportBuilderIIAR.class.getName();
062    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(CLASS_NAME);
063
064    private Connection connection;
065
066    /**
067     * Constructs a new ReportBuilderIIAR.
068     *
069     * @param name the actor name
070     * @param builder the ReportBuilder POJO to wrap
071     */
072    public ReportBuilderIIAR(String name, ReportBuilder builder) {
073        super(name, builder);
074        initConnection();
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Constructs a new ReportBuilderIIAR with actor system.
079     *
080     * @param name the actor name
081     * @param builder the ReportBuilder POJO to wrap
082     * @param system the actor system
083     */
084    public ReportBuilderIIAR(String name, ReportBuilder builder, IIActorSystem system) {
085        super(name, builder, system);
086        initConnection();
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Initialize database connection from DistributedLogStore.
091     */
092    private void initConnection() {
093        DistributedLogStore logStore = DistributedLogStore.getInstance();
094        if (logStore != null) {
095            this.connection = logStore.getConnection();
096            logger.fine("ReportBuilderIIAR: Initialized database connection");
097        }
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Sets the database connection (for testing).
102     *
103     * @param connection the JDBC connection
104     */
105    public void setConnection(Connection connection) {
106        this.connection = connection;
107    }
108
109    // ========================================================================
110    // Actions
111    // ========================================================================
112
113    /**
114     * Adds workflow info section.
115     *
116     * <p>Gets workflow path from nodeGroup, reads the YAML file to extract
117     * name and description, and adds a WorkflowInfoSection to the report.</p>
118     *
119     * @param args unused
120     * @return ActionResult indicating success or failure
121     */
122    @Action("addWorkflowInfo")
123    public ActionResult addWorkflowInfo(String args) {
124        logger.info("ReportBuilderIIAR.addWorkflowInfo");
125
126        String workflowPath = getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup();
127        if (workflowPath == null) {
128            return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get workflow path from nodeGroup");
129        }
130
131        String name = null;
132        String description = null;
133
134        // Try to read workflow YAML for name and description
135        try {
136            Path path = Paths.get(workflowPath);
137            if (!Files.exists(path)) {
138                path = Paths.get(System.getProperty("user.dir"), workflowPath);
139            }
140
141            if (Files.exists(path)) {
142                try (InputStream is = Files.newInputStream(path)) {
143                    Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
144                    Map<String, Object> data = yaml.load(is);
145                    if (data != null) {
146                        name = (String) data.get("name");
147                        Object descObj = data.get("description");
148                        description = descObj != null ? descObj.toString().trim() : null;
149                    }
150                }
151            }
152        } catch (Exception e) {
153            logger.warning("ReportBuilderIIAR.addWorkflowInfo: Could not read workflow file: " + e.getMessage());
154        }
155
156        this.object.addSection(new WorkflowInfoSection(workflowPath, name, description));
157        return new ActionResult(true, "Workflow info section added");
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Adds JsonState section for specified actor.
162     *
163     * <p>Arguments (JSON):</p>
164     * <ul>
165     *   <li>{@code actor} - Actor name (required)</li>
166     *   <li>{@code path} - JsonState path filter (optional)</li>
167     * </ul>
168     *
169     * @param args JSON arguments
170     * @return ActionResult indicating success or failure
171     */
172    @Action("addJsonStateSection")
173    public ActionResult addJsonStateSection(String args) {
174        logger.info("ReportBuilderIIAR.addJsonStateSection: args=" + args);
175
176        String actorName;
177        String path = "";
178
179        try {
180            JSONObject json = new JSONObject(args);
181            actorName = json.getString("actor");
182            path = json.optString("path", "");
183        } catch (Exception e) {
184            return new ActionResult(false, "Invalid arguments: " + e.getMessage());
185        }
186
187        if (system() == null) {
188            return new ActionResult(false, "ActorSystem not available");
189        }
190
191        IIActorRef<?> targetActor = ((IIActorSystem) system()).getIIActor(actorName);
192        if (targetActor == null) {
193            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor not found: " + actorName);
194        }
195
196        JsonState jsonState = targetActor.json();
197        if (jsonState == null) {
198            return new ActionResult(false, "Actor has no JsonState: " + actorName);
199        }
200
201        String yamlContent = jsonState.toStringOfYaml(path);
202        this.object.addSection(new JsonStateSection(actorName, yamlContent));
203
204        return new ActionResult(true, "JsonState section added for " + actorName);
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * Adds transition section from log database.
209     *
210     * @param args unused
211     * @return ActionResult indicating success or failure
212     */
213    @Action("addTransitionSection")
214    public ActionResult addTransitionSection(String args) {
215        logger.info("ReportBuilderIIAR.addTransitionSection");
216
217        if (connection == null) {
218            return new ActionResult(false, "Database connection not available");
219        }
220
221        long sessionId;
222        try {
223            sessionId = getSessionIdFromNodeGroup();
224        } catch (Exception e) {
225            return new ActionResult(false, "Could not get session ID: " + e.getMessage());
226        }
227
228        TransitionSection section = new TransitionSection();
229
230        try {
231            String sql = "SELECT label, level, message FROM logs " +
232                         "WHERE session_id = ? AND message LIKE 'Transition %' " +
233                         "ORDER BY timestamp";
234
235            try (PreparedStatement ps = connection.prepareStatement(sql)) {
236                ps.setLong(1, sessionId);
237                try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
238                    while (rs.next()) {
239                        String label = rs.getString("label");
240                        String message = rs.getString("message");
241
242                        boolean success = message.contains("SUCCESS");
243                        String errorMessage = null;
244
245                        if (!success) {
246                            int dashIdx = message.indexOf(" - ");
247                            if (dashIdx > 0) {
248                                errorMessage = message.substring(dashIdx + 3);
249                            }
250                        }
251
252                        section.addTransition(
253                            label != null ? label : "unknown",
254                            success,
255                            errorMessage
256                        );
257                    }
258                }
259            }
260        } catch (Exception e) {
261            logger.warning("ReportBuilderIIAR.addTransitionSection: DB error: " + e.getMessage());
262            return new ActionResult(false, "Database error: " + e.getMessage());
263        }
264
265        this.object.addSection(section);
266        return new ActionResult(true, "Transition section added");
267    }
268
269    /**
270     * Builds and outputs the report.
271     *
272     * @param args unused
273     * @return ActionResult with the report content
274     */
275    @Action("report")
276    public ActionResult report(String args) {
277        logger.info("ReportBuilderIIAR.report");
278
279        String reportContent = this.object.build();
280        reportToMultiplexer(reportContent);
281
282        return new ActionResult(true, reportContent);
283    }
284
285    // ========================================================================
286    // Helper Methods
287    // ========================================================================
288
289    /**
290     * Gets workflow path from nodeGroup actor.
291     */
292    private String getWorkflowPathFromNodeGroup() {
293        if (system() == null) return null;
294        IIActorSystem iiSystem = (IIActorSystem) system();
295
296        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = iiSystem.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
297        if (nodeGroup == null) return null;
298
299        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getWorkflowPath", "");
300        return result.isSuccess() ? result.getResult() : null;
301    }
302
303    /**
304     * Gets session ID from nodeGroup actor.
305     */
306    private long getSessionIdFromNodeGroup() {
307        if (system() == null) {
308            throw new RuntimeException("ActorSystem not set");
309        }
310        IIActorSystem iiSystem = (IIActorSystem) system();
311
312        IIActorRef<?> nodeGroup = iiSystem.getIIActor("nodeGroup");
313        if (nodeGroup == null) {
314            throw new RuntimeException("nodeGroup not found");
315        }
316
317        ActionResult result = nodeGroup.callByActionName("getSessionId", "");
318        if (!result.isSuccess()) {
319            throw new RuntimeException("Could not get session ID from nodeGroup");
320        }
321
322        return Long.parseLong(result.getResult());
323    }
324
325    /**
326     * Outputs report to outputMultiplexer.
327     */
328    private void reportToMultiplexer(String data) {
329        if (system() == null) return;
330        IIActorSystem iiSystem = (IIActorSystem) system();
331
332        IIActorRef<?> multiplexer = iiSystem.getIIActor("outputMultiplexer");
333        if (multiplexer == null) return;
334
335        JSONObject arg = new JSONObject();
336        arg.put("source", "report-builder");
337        arg.put("type", "plugin-result");
338        arg.put("data", data);
339        multiplexer.callByActionName("add", arg.toString());
340    }
341}
